summary:
Head of Customer Support with over 7 years of experience in making customers happy
I am well-equipped to lead and manage customer support teams to deliver exceptional service. With a track record of success overseeing diverse teams and improving customer satisfaction levels, I have honed my skills in building strong customer relationships and resolving complex issues.

school.name: Moscow State Institute of International Relations (University) MFA Russia MGIMO

profile_positions.description:
• Joined a young and ambitious team that lacked experience and knowledge in the area of customer support 
• In 3 months finished a complete overhaul of the way the customer support team functioned, introduced KPI for all the customer support agents, formulated the main principles of customer support, built a support personality for the agents to refer to, reviewed and revised all of the training materials 
• In 4 months achieved the highest CSAT score recorded in the history of the company (> 90% CSAT) 
• In 6 months introduced the team to the most modern customer support tools and techniques, reducing the average handling time from 10 min to 3 min, the average response time from 20 min down to 30 sec 
• Achieved 0% attrition rate, regularly communicated with the team members directly, implemented many team-building exercises
profile_positions.title: Head of Customer Support

profile_positions.description:
• Contributed to the launch of the E-commerce business in Russia as I was part of the team in charge of the launch 
• Formulated the customer support principles for the entire EC business unit in Russia 
• Created a long-term development strategy for the customer support team based on KPI and profitability targets for the business unit 
• Collaborated with Global Headquarters to implement the best customer support practices 
• After the launch, consistently (for three years in a row) achieved the best Customer Satisfaction score in the world among all of the countries where UNIQLO was present (>95% CSAT) 
• Introduced the customer support team to multiple innovative tools, including modern CRM systems, chat platforms, etc. 
• Implemented the productivity tracking system, which allowed the customer support team to reduce the occupancy and utilization rate 
• Consistently demonstrated the best results in the world in terms of first response rate (< 5 sec), average handling time (< 2 min)
profile_positions.title: Head of Customer Support

profile_positions.description: UNIQLO Mega Belaya Dacha store (the oldest and most well known suburban store in Russia)
profile_positions.title: Senior Store Manager

profile_positions.location: St Petersburg, St Petersburg City, Russia
profile_positions.description:
Led the preparation procedures for the opening of the largest store in Russia (at that moment) with more than 120 employees - UNIQLO Galeria 
• Trained staff members to execute the highest quality of customer service possible 
• Achieved both sales targets and contribution profit targets 
• Nominated to be the best store in Russia for the exemplary quality of customer service
• Multiple team members won the Customer Satisfaction Award for their outstanding customer service
profile_positions.title: Store Manager

profile_positions.description:
Store Manager of UNIQLO Goodzone store
• Planned and prepared the store's grand opening, including hiring, inventory management, sales targets, etc.
• Ensured stable sales performance and contribution profit
• Promoted 4 staff members to senior positions including 1 Assistant Store Manager, executed training of 2 manager candidates (leadership program)
profile_positions.title: Store Manager

profile_positions.description:
Assistant Store Manager in multiple UNIQLO stores in Moscow, Russia, including several large-scale ones - Acquired skills of Partner/Senior Partner/Advanced Partner grades (Customer service, staff training, work schedule planning, visual merchandising, etc.); 
- Worked as acting Store Manager in charge of M's shop floor planning, daily/weekly/monthly work schedule planning, personnel development
profile_positions.title: Assistant Store Manager
